name: Tsuru-Puru-Purun
effectText: If this card is in your hand: You can target 1 WATER monster in your Main Monster Zone; destroy that monster you control, and if you do, Special Summon this card to the zone that monster was in, then you can destroy all face-up cards your opponent controls in this card's column. You can only use this effect of "Tsuru-Puru-Purun" once per turn.
